message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm not budging!
I'm willing to compromise, but not that much!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm trying to hold on, but I'm getting worried about the endgame!
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
I'm almost out of options, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're almost out of time, and I'm almost out of mercy!
I'm desperate, but I'm not giving up yet! Last chance, Bob!
You should have taken the last chance when you had it...
I'm out of options, but I'm not giving up the fight!
You should have taken my offer when you had the chance... now you get nothing!
